attributes.additional_details:
After the SQA have implemented a new exam system many children are sitting prelims that are no longer worth anything as they have abolished the appeal system.
Let's help the children get the grades they deserve.
Many children have struggled with the changes made half way through their studies and they shouldn't be penalised for something that wasn't their decision.
Hopefully if we get enough signatures they will either bring back the appeal or abolish prelims.
